gameTitle: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
content: It is an amazing open-world adventure with beautiful graphics and engaging gameplay.
A fun platformer that brings a fresh take on the Mario franchise.
An addictive roguelike with stunning art and a compelling story.
A relaxing and charming life-simulation game that's perfect for unwinding.
Terrific open-world design, with lots to do and have fun while doing them.
A heartwarming farming simulator with lots of replay value.
A challenging platformer with a good narrative about overcoming personal struggles.
Fantastic story, starts off slow, but if you stay past the first 3 hours, you are in for an adventure.
Fantastic soundtrack, art, combat, action adventure, and character design.
Great jump scares, the envirnment really makes you feel like you are there.
Great web-slinging mechanics, you actually feel like a superhero in NYC.
A punishing but rewarding action RPG with deep lore and tight gameplay.
A stylish and engaging JRPG with a unique blend of social simulation and dungeon crawling.
A fast-paced team shooter with a diverse cast of characters. Lots of fun with friends.
Very fun battle royale, with constant DLC updates for new characters.
An endlessly creative sandbox game that encourages exploration and building.
An ambitious RPG with a richly detailed world that takes in the future, though has lots of bugs.
A simple yet addictive social deduction game that's perfect for parties.
A fun and chaotic battle royale with colorful and playful obstacle courses.
A faithful and stunning reimagining of a beloved classic RPG.
Terrific RPG that feels like was made with genuine love. Won game of the year.
Captivating story and amazing dueling mechanics.
Thrilling and really fun jump scares. Great graphics and visuals.
Mediocre combat, but pretty good story.
Beautiful open world, fantastic questlines, and great weapons selection.
